LanguageData.Turret_MiniTurret_CGear.label: TC Mini-turret
LanguageData.Bullet_CGear_MiniTurret.label: TC Mini-turret bullet
LanguageData.Gun_CGear_MiniTurret.label: TC Mini-turret gun
LanguageData.Gun_CGear_MiniTurret.description: A tactical charged automatic gun made to be mounted on a turret.
LanguageData.Turret_CGear_Mortar.label: TC Mortar
LanguageData.Turret_CGear_Mortar.description: Based on the standard manned mortar but with improved aiming capabilities.
LanguageData.Artillery_Mortar_CGear.label: TC Mortar
LanguageData.Artillery_Mortar_CGear.description: Mortar launcher. Lobs bombs over walls. Inaccurate but long-ranged.
LanguageData.TrapIED_CGear_HE.label: TC IED Charged trap
LanguageData.TrapIED_CGear_HE.description: A TC Shell connected to a touch-activated trigger. Since it is hidden in the surrounding terrain, it cannot be placed adjacent to other traps. Animals can sense these when calm.
LanguageData.TrapIED_CGear_Smoke.label: TC IED smoke trap
LanguageData.TrapIED_CGear_Smoke.description: A TC Shell connected to a touch-activated trigger. Since it is hidden in the surrounding terrain, it cannot be placed adjacent to other traps. Animals can sense these when calm.
LanguageData.TrapIED_CGear_FlashBang.label: TC IED Flashbang trap
LanguageData.TrapIED_CGear_FlashBang.description: A TC Shell connected to a touch-activated trigger. Since it is hidden in the surrounding terrain, it cannot be placed adjacent to other traps. Animals can sense these when calm.
LanguageData.TrapIED_CGear_EMP.label: TC IED EMP trap
LanguageData.TrapIED_CGear_EMP.description: A TC Shell connected to a touch-activated trigger. Since it is hidden in the surrounding terrain, it cannot be placed adjacent to other traps. Animals can sense these when calm.
LanguageData.TrapIED_CGear_Flame.label: TC IED incendiary trap
LanguageData.TrapIED_CGear_Flame.description: A TC Shell connected to a touch-activated trigger. Since it is hidden in the surrounding terrain, it cannot be placed adjacent to other traps. Animals can sense these when calm.
